name: ルミナスアーク3 アイズ オリジナル・サウンドトラック
summary:
Music Composer & Arranger:
    Syunsuke Tsuchiya (PROCYON STUDIO): 1.02, 1.04, 1.08~11, 1.13, 1.17, 1.19~21, 1.24, 2.01~3, 2.05, 2.06, 2.13, 2.15, 2.20, 2.21
    Maki Kirioka (PROCYON STUDIO): 1.01, 1.03, 1.05~7, 1.12, 1.14~16, 1.18, 1.23, 2.04, 2.07~12, 2.14, 2.16~19
    Yoko Shimomura (midiplex): 1.22

Mastering Engineer: Hiroshi Tanabe
Location: PROCYON STUDIO
Sound Producer: Yasunori Mitsuda (PROCYON STUDIO)


1.01 Wake up World - Luminous Arc3 EYES Theme Song -
    Music & Arrange: Maki Kirioka (PROCYON STUDIO)
    Vocal & Chorus: CHiCO [ACE] (UNIVERSAL MUSIC e-SUM RECORDS)
    Lyrics: HeArt MakiArt (ハートマキアート) (PROCYON STUDIO)
    Guitar & Bass: Hiroshi Tanabe
    Strings: Konno Strings
    Recording & Mixing Engineer: Suminobu Hamada (Wonder Station)
    Recording Engineer: Hiroyuki Akita (Wonder Station)
    Assistant Engineer: Eimi Handa (半田栄美) (Wonder Station)
    Sound Coordinator: Yasunori Mitsuda (PROCYON STUDIO), Tsutomu Satomi (里見勉) (Uchida Ongaku Jimusho)

2.01 Magic Night
    Music & Arrange: Syunsuke Tsuchiya (PROCYON STUDIO)
    Vocal: Aki Toyosaki
    Chorus: CHiCO [ACE] (UNIVERSAL MUSIC e-SUM RECORDS)
    Lyrics: Yukiko Mitsui
    Guitar: Mitsuhiro Ohta
    Drums & Percussion: Akihiro Motohashi (本橋昭宏)
    Recording & Mixing Engineer: Suminobu Hamada (Wonder Station)
    Assistant Engineer: Eimi Handa (Wonder Station)
    Sound Coordinator: Yasunori Mitsuda (PROCYON STUDIO), Tsutomu Satomi (Uchida Ongaku Jimusho)


Art Direction & Design: Rina Miyoshi (三好里奈) (TIME ROCKET)
Label Director: Yusuke Hasegawa (長谷川雄介) (TEAM Entertainment)

Special Thanks to... Hideyuki Mizutani (水谷英之) (MMV), Hikaru Nakano (中野魅) (MMV), Ryoei Mikage (御影良衛) (imageepoch), Kazuya Adachi (足立和也) (imageepoch), Teruyuki Shirakawa (白川照幸), Miyuki Kishimoto (岸本みゆき), All Staffs of "Luminous Arc3 EYES"
info:
• 中文名: 弧光之源3：瞳 游戏原声集
